markdownRemark.html:
Have you played Footbl 5 yet?

The football game that is going viral on social media. Play on your phone, iPad, laptop or PC. Footbl5 is based upon Football Wordle, you must guess the famous footballer’s surname.

Some player’s names can be rude or funny, though and they could well appear as answers on Lewdle, another Wordle inspired game where the player guesses the swear word.

Why not check out our Football Wordle Top Ten?

  1. Ice Cream
    Ice Cream is a Nigerian midfielder who has played for various clubs in Macedonia, Austria, Malta and Israel.

  2. Fabian Assman
    Argentinian goalkeeper playing for Independiente in the Primera División.

  3. Paul Dickov
    Retired Scottish striker who played over 400 games for Arsenal, Leicester City, Blackburn Rovers and Man City.

  4. David Seaman
    Well known retired goalkeeper who played for Arsenal and England.

  5. Bernt Haas
    Haas played for Sunderland and West Bromwich Albion.

  6. Stefan Kuntz
    Stefan Kuntz is a German professional football manager and former player who played as a striker. He is the head coach of the Turkey national team.

  7. Dean Windass
    Retired striker for Hull City, Bradford City and other clubs with 732 games and 234 goals.

  8. Argelico Fucks
    Retired Brazilian footballer, who played for FC Porto and SL Benfica.

  9. Nortei Nortey
    English-Ghanaian midfielder who plays for Northern Colorado Hailstorm in USL League One.

  10. Chiqui Arce
    Chiqui Arce played right back for Paraguay in the 1998 and 2002 World Cups.

Footbl5 pays homage to Josh Wardle in this challenging new browser game that has gone viral.

Twitter is filling up with users who publish their results. Guess the hidden past or present footballer in 6 tries in this football wordle game. A new player is available each day.

So if you’re a Chiqui arce, very Nortei Nortey or just want an Ice Cream, then why not challenge your mates to this test of your footballing knowledge.

Bye
James Bye (RIP) who played for Birmingham City FC

frontmatter.title: Player Names can be Rude and Funny
frontmatter.description: Rude and Funny football player names, but will any appear on Footbl 5, Footbl 6 or Missing 11? Play to find out.
